SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DocNum,DocDate,CardName,DocTotal,Comments,ObjType,DocEntry FROM ODPO WHERE DocNum Like '%:1%' AND (:4 Between ':2' and ':3') AND DocStatus = 'O' AND CardCode = ':5' UNION ALL SELECT DocNum,DocDate,CardName,DocTotal,Comments,ObjType,DocEntry FROM OPCH WHERE DocNum Like '%:1%' AND (:4 Between ':2' and ':3') AND DocStatus = 'O' AND CardCode = ':5' UNION ALL SELECT DocNum,DocDate,CardName,DocTotal,Comments,ObjType,DocEntry FROM ORPC WHERE DocNum Like '%:1%' AND (:4 Between ':2' and ':3') AND DocStatus = 'O' AND CardCode = ':5'

SELECT DocNum,DocDate,CardName,DocTotal,Comments,ObjType,DocEntry FROM ODPI WHERE DocNum Like '%:1%' AND (:4 Between ':2' and ':3') AND DocStatus = 'O' AND CardCode = ':5' UNION ALL SELECT DocNum,DocDate,CardName,DocTotal,Comments,ObjType,DocEntry FROM OINV WHERE DocNum Like '%:1%' AND (:4 Between ':2' and ':3') AND DocStatus = 'O' AND CardCode = ':5' UNION ALL SELECT DocNum,DocDate,CardName,DocTotal,Comments,ObjType,DocEntry FROM ORIN WHERE DocNum Like '%:1%' AND (:4 Between ':2' and ':3') AND DocStatus = 'O' AND CardCode = ':5'
